title: Foot Stepper Pro
description: Foot Stepper Pro: The ultimate Footstep Pack. Combined character types. Realistic, randomized cues, spatial sound. Elevate your game's audio now!"
longDescription:
Introducing Foot Stepper Pro built exclusively for Unreal Engine game designers. This comprehensive pack caters to every character type, offering pre-combined footsteps that save you time and effort. Our high-quality microphone recordings and meticulous resampling ensure unparalleled realism and variation at every step.



The latest Edition of the sound fX pack adds an Anim Notify Blueprint which helps users quickly and easily add sounds to their game. Just choose the sound cues, create Physical materials for each surface, add those to any mesh or material in the level, and finally add the notify track to each animation that will trigger the sound.


Sample


Sample 2


With advanced features like randomized Sound Cues, each footfall will be unique, enhancing immersion and avoiding repetitiveness. The pack covers every type of shoe and surface, from bare feet to armored warriors, ensuring seamless integration into your game world.


We have tried to make every surface and shoe type available, even children's footsteps and barefoot sounds.



Foot Ware includes:

Shoes

Boots

Armor

Barefoot

High Heels

Dress Shoes

Children



Surfaces include:

Dirt

Rock

Street Pavement

Metal

Mud

Water

Trail (Branches)

Field

Wood

Creaky wood


Character Types include:

These are combo sounds that include extra sounds a character might make.

Astronaut

Police

Soldier

Armored Soldier


Spatial sound attenuation has been implemented to provide an immersive auditory experience for players. As you focus on creating your game, 'Foot Stepper Pro' elevates your audio design, making your characters come to life with lifelike footstep sounds.


This is a growing pack, more sounds to come.



Need a footstep, reach out and we will record and add it.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Realistic High-quality Recordings
  •  Combined sounds for character types, like Armor or soldier to save on Sfx calls/samples used
  •  Per surface sounds to accommodate Landscapes and surfaces
  • Ever growing Library

Number of Audio Waves: 1,244

Number of Audio Cues: 63

Sample rate/bit rate: 16 Bit/44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 20 Minutes 44 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Documentation

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Added Anim Notify Blueprint for demo purposes and user reference.
Updated Missing Sounds from Sound Cue
